name: Overflown
description:
Trashbags pile on each other, it is time to clean up !

Defeat foes, dive underwater, and challenge yourself in this short platformer !

Made in 15 days for the Seajam , source code is available here.

Controls: Arrow keys or WASD/ZQSD ( depending if you choose the Qwerty or Azerty version ) to move, space to jump
